title: 02/17/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/17/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NBC's Rodney Harrison about his conversation with Aaron Donald on retirement. Mark Wahlberg explains why the Super Bowl halftime show was his favorite of all-time. And Dale Earnhardt tells us about whether he'd flip off other drivers during NASCAR races.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
